name: Zombibit
description:
an online multiplayer game.

survive with a friend an attack of zombies

Controlls:

•move the mouse to aim

•move with the arrow keys

•shoot with left click

How to create a room:

•one player enter a room name and press "create room"

•the second player enter the same name of the room that the first player created in the "join room" textbox and press "join"
